attributes.action: Get rid of universal credit, bring back the old system!
attributes.additional_details:
As reported on the news some people have unfortunately lost there lives, had to sel there belongings, go without food even turn to prostitution because of this ridiculous system I say we get rid bring back the old system!
I’m a working person and I am effectively worse off than I ever was!
attributes.background: Since being on universal credit I have never scraped and scrounged to get by more than I have since moving from the old system, in fact I think there is a lot of people who feel the same and have been on worse situations than me, it’s left me months with no money let’s take a stand and get rid!
